attributes.action: Purchase a voice box for Ruth Kelly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please purchase a voice box for Minister Ruth Kelly to ensure her monotone voice is disguised on all radio interviews.
I feel that at present, her monotone voice coupled with her drab brown nosing polocies are endangering the lives of thousands of soon to be road priced commuters by forcing them to nod off at the wheel.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
